Plot: The story of the romance between the King of Siam and widowed British schoolteacher, Anna Leonowens, during the 1860s.
Title: Anna and the King
Writer: Anna Leonowens (diaries), Steve Meerson (screenplay), Peter Krikes (screenplay)
Actors: Jodie Foster, Yun-Fat Chow, Bai Ling, Tom Felton
tomatoConsensus: Beautiful cinematography can't prevent Anna and the King from being boring and overly lengthy.
